title: wine_Coquelicot_2012_Riesling_(Santa_Ynez_Valley)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 42739.
country: US.
description: “Gas station” isn't necessarily the most attractive fine-wine descriptor, but it's both apt and complimentary for a dry Riesling. This one reeks of petrol and tar. On the palate, a warm tar presence slowly evolves toward vanilla. A vibrant, tingling acidity indicates decent cellaring potential. At the very least, this is a great wine to show your friends how petrol can be a defining and excellent character in wine..
designation: .
points: 91.
price: 29.0.
province: California.
